English.subject: ğŸ’¡ Enter the video topic
English.qa_upload_hint: Upload your file (.txt/pdf/docx < 5Mb) to vector database, and AI will refer to it to answer questions
English.agent_upload_hint: Upload the CSV file you need to analyze (less than 5Mb)
English.agent_question_hint: Ask a question, such as analyzing/extracting data, or visualization requirements (supporting bar chart, line chart, and scatter plots)
English.openai_unavailable: OpenAI API is unavailable in China
English.prompt_title_string: Please come up with an attractive title for the video on the <{subject}> topic and answer in {lang}
English.prompt_script_string:
You are a short-video blogger. Based on the following title and relevant information, write a video script and answer in {lang}. Video title: {title}, Video duration: {duration} minutes. The length of the generated script should follow the requirements of the video duration as much as possible. The opening should be eye-catching, the middle should provide valuable content, and the ending should have a pleasant surprise. The overall content should be expressed in a light and interesting way to attract young people. The script format is separated by [Opening], [Body], and [Ending]. The script content can be combined with the following information searched from wikipedia, but it is only for reference. Only the relevant content should be combined, and the irrelevant ones should be ignored: 
```{wikipedia_search}```
Also, if the user uploads relevant information, it can also be used as a reference. If there is no information, please ignore:
```{reference_prompt}```
